sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { UilTemperature, UilTear, UilWind, UilSun, UilSunset, } from "@iconscout/react-unicons"; import { formatToLocalTime, iconUrlFromCode } from "../services/weatherService"; function TemperatureAndDetails({ weather: { details, icon, temp, temp_min, temp_max, sunrise, sunset, speed, humidity, feels_like, timezone, }, }) { let czech_details = "Jasno" if (details === "Clear") { czech_details = "Jasno" } else if (details === "Clouds") { czech_details = "Zataženo" } return (

{czech_details}

{`${temp.toFixed()}°`}

Pocitově: {`${feels_like.toFixed()}°`}
Vlhkost: {`${humidity.toFixed()}%`}
Vítr: {`${speed.toFixed()} km/h`}

Východ:{" "} {formatToLocalTime(sunrise, timezone, "HH:mm")}

|

Západ:{" "} {formatToLocalTime(sunset, timezone, "HH:mm")}

|

Nejvyšší teplota:{" "} {`${temp_max.toFixed()}°`}

|

Nejnižší teplota:{" "} {`${temp_min.toFixed()}°`}

); } export default TemperatureAndDetails;
